DOC.brief_title: Inflammatory Cytokines Profile Individuals Subjected Surgical Procedures Using Propofol Isoflurane
DOC.detailed_description: Twenty ASA-I patient , subject otorhinolaryngology surgery , randomly allocate one group receive anesthesia isoflurane 1 MAC ( minimum alveolar concentration ) ( n = 20 ) . Other group twenty ASA-I patient receive propofol 2 4 microgram mL-1 ( n = 20 ) . Fentanyl 5 mg kg-1 rocuronium bromide 0.6 mg kg-1 also administer patient . Venous blood ( 10 mL ) collect patient follow time : beginning surgery anesthesia ( T1 ) , 2 h beginning surgery ( T2 ) , day anesthetic-surgical procedure ( T3 ) . Plasma concentration interleukins IL-1beta , IL-6 , IL-8 , IL-10 IL-12 tumor necrosis factor ( TNF-alpha ) measure sample flow cytometry technique use method Cytometric Bead Array ( CBA ) . Venous blood sample fifteen volunteer subject stress also collect control , cytokine measure .
DOC.criteria: Patients good health American Society Anesthesia status physical I Elective minor surgery General anesthesia Smokers Alcoholics Previous medication radiation
